page.title: 03FARMING
page.content: {Grimoldby, Lincolnshire {Farming Main crops in this area: {Winter Wheat}- milling and cattle feed {Barley}(Winter, Spring) - malting, feed, combine harvested, straw baled or burnt - much controversy. {Oil Seed Rape}- seed crushed for oil. {Peas, Broad Beans}- For freezing. {Dried Peas {Poatoes {Pick Your Own Fruit}- Raspberries, strawberries, blackcurrants. {Daffodils, Narcissi}- Bulbs. Flowers exported to the continent. Mainly grown for bulbs. {Lincoln Red Pedigree Breeding Herd}- also Charolais cross beef cattle, cows and calves.
